column3: Verify login with valid email and password
column4: User is on Amazon Login Page
column5: 1.Open Amazon website   2. Click on Login Page 3.Enter Valid Email                4 Enter Valid Password                         5.Click on Login Button
column7: User should log in successfully and be taken to homepage

column3: Verify search with a valid product name
column4: User is logged in  and on the Amazon homepage
column5:
1. Open Amazon homepage
2. Click on search bar
3. Type samsung s24
4. Press Enter
column7: List of samsung s24 products should be displayed
column8: system show s25 and a55 instead of s24

column3: Verify adding a product to the cart
column4: User is logged in and product listing is visible
column5:
1. Search for a product (example: “Samsung s24”)
2. Select any product from results
3. Click on the product
4. Click “Add to Cart”
column7: Product should successfully appear in cart
column8: samsung s24 added in cart successful

column3: Verify removing a product from the cart
column4: Product is already add to cart
column5:
1. Go to Cart page
2. Select any product
3. Click “Delete” or “Remove”
column7: Product should be removed from the cart and cart count updated
